question.text: Which of the following is not the task under the Reproductive and child health care (RCH) program?

options.text: Providing facilities to build up a reproductively healthy society.

solution.text:
Reproductive and Child Health Care (RCH) was launched with following objectives :

1. Creating awareness and providing information to the people about reproduction and other related aspects :

A. Reproductive organs. B. Adolescence and related changes.

C. Safe and hygienic sexual practices. D. Sexually transmitted diseases (STD).

E. Marriageable age. F. Birth control options.

G. Care of pregnant mothers and post- natal care of the mother and child.

H. Importance of breast feeding.

I. Massive child immunization.

2. Providing facilities and support for building up a reproductively healthy society are the major tasks under these programmes.
